meaningMnemonic: When you're in <radical>prison</radical>, whoever ends up with the <radical>shellfish</radical> will <kanji>lose</kanji>. It's the game all prisoners play. It's like keep away from the shellfish. And if you end up with the shellfish BZZZZTT that's it, you're the loser.
readingMnemonic: If you <kanji>lose</kanji>, you're a <reading>foo</reading>l (ふ). All you had to do was not hold the prison shellfish. It really shouldn't have been that hard to not lose, ya fool.
